name: Eddie Griffin - Freedom of Speech
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Comedy Central honored him on its list of the Top 100 Greatest Stand-Up Comedians of All Time! Now Eddie Griffin showcases his awesome comedic talents in this stellar performance filmed before a live audience in Atlanta, GA. Known for his outrageous personality, keen wit, and in-your-face style, Griffin combines personal experiences with his edgy take on everything imaginable to bring down the house in this hysterical, politically incorrect concert film.
about_the_game: Comedy Central honored him on its list of the Top 100 Greatest Stand-Up Comedians of All Time! Now Eddie Griffin showcases his awesome comedic talents in this stellar performance filmed before a live audience in Atlanta, GA. Known for his outrageous personality, keen wit, and in-your-face style, Griffin combines personal experiences with his edgy take on everything imaginable to bring down the house in this hysterical, politically incorrect concert film.
short_description: Eddie Griffin, one of Comedy Central's “Top 100 Greatest Stand-Up Comedians of All Time” brings down the house with his edgy take on everything in this live performance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
